column4: heya.. i got an old ubuntu installation.. i need to load up the server edition on it
can anyone put up their sources.list for me pelase..
i got ssh access to it
so can someone help me with this
do you guys read what i write?
you need to write everything on a single line
ubottu's message answers your question then
yeah i asked them to do that for me
I'm not sure what you are asking.  X isn't installed in the server version
right.. but i can optionally install it
right, but why since it is headless?
the person whose gonna admin it is umm.. not console savvy.. so i think i might have to get him a vnc access to it
you don't need all of X for that afaik.  googling "headless ubuntu server vnc" turns up some promising results
